thread.title: BRIEF-Datang Telecom's Smartphone Chip JV With Qualcomm (China) Gets Anti-Monopoly Regulator's Approval

title: BRIEF-Datang Telecom's Smartphone Chip JV With Qualcomm (China) Gets Anti-Monopoly Regulator's Approval

organizations.name: reuters) - datang telecom technology co ltd

text:
May 4, 2018 / 12:51 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Datang Telecom's Smartphone Chip JV With Qualcomm (China) Gets Anti-Monopoly Regulator's Approval Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 4 (Reuters) - Datang Telecom Technology Co Ltd :
* SAYS ITS SMARTPHONE CHIP JV WITH QUALCOMM (CHINA) GETS GREEN LIGHT FROM CHINAâ€™S ANTI-MONOPOLY REGULATOR
* SAYS TRADING IN SHARES REMAINS SUSPENDED Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2HPPciG ; bit.ly/2HT998c Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
